name: Crystal Events
description: Crystal Events is a event management project. A client can book different types of services like event coordination, event planning, event entertainment etc. A awesome dashboard implemented in this project for both client and admin panel. A user friendly UI design makes the project next level. I'm still work on it.
features1: 1. A client can book different types of services.
features2: 2. Sign In is required for booking. Google sign in method is implemented for sign in.
features3: 3. Stipe Payment method is implemented for client payment
features4: 4. Different Dashboard system for both user and admin.
features5: 5. A specific user can see only his data instead of all data where an admin can see all of user data for booking

name: Doctors Portal
description: Doctors Portal is a Hospital based project. It stand for patients appointment through the websites. A patient can book an appointment by using his account. Patient can choose the date of appointment and category of the appointment then book it. Different types of Dashboard in this website, one is for user, another is for admin panel.
features1: 1. A patient can book an appointment with proper time and checkup category.
features2: 2. Sign In is required for booking. Facebook & Google and sign in method is implemented for sign in.
features3: 3. Only Admin can add doctors and can see all the patient information
features4: 4. Different Dashboard system for both user and admin.
features5: 5. A specific user can see only his data instead of all data where an admin can see all of user data for booking as well as everyone can review of the service and this review can see in home page

name: Food Desire
description: Food Desire is a E-commerce Type project. A user can buy different types of product like grocery, electronic, cloths etc. A awesome dashboard implemented in this project for both client and admin panel. A user friendly UI design makes the project next level. I'm still work on it.
features1: 1. A client can Buy different types of Product From the site.
features2: 2. Sign In is required for checkout. Google sign in method is implemented for sign in.
features3: 3. Only Admin can add product or delete product from site
features4: 4. Different Dashboard system for both user and admin.
features5: 5. A specific user can see only his data instead of all data where an admin can see all of user data for booking

name: City Rider
description: City Rider is basically a react with firebase authentication project. Where I build different types of authentication google, facebook and email authentication system. A user can search how many vahicle for from to destination, also integrate a google map in the project. A user friendly UI design makes the project next level. I'm still work on it.
features1: 1. A user can choose vahicle as user's wish and book it.
features2: 2. Sign In is required for booking. Google sign, facebook sign in and email sign in method is implemented for sign in.
features3: 3. A beautiful google map is integrate for making user friendly
features4: 4. Different Dashboard system for both user and admin.
features5: 5. A specific user can see only his data instead of all data where an admin can see all of user data for booking
